languages.text: Наблюдая с орбиты за падением мира-святыни Игримонт, святой Фальстоу пролил скорбные слезы, что были собраны в священный флакон и помещены в реликварий.
As he watched the fall of the shrine world Igrimont from orbit, Saint Falstow shed mournful tears, which were collected in a sacred vial and placed in the reliquary.
languages.original_text: Наблюдая с орбиты за падением мира-святыни Игримонт, святой Фальстоу пролил скорбные слезы, что были собраны в священный флакон и помещены в реликварий.

traits.locale_text: As he watched the fall of the shrine world Igrimont from orbit, Saint Falstow shed mournful tears, which were collected in a sacred vial and placed in the reliquary.

As he watched the fall of the shrine world Igrimont from orbit, Saint Falstow shed mournful tears, which were collected in a sacred vial and placed in the reliquary.

languages.text: 当圣法尔斯托从星轨上看着神殿世界伊格里蒙特陨落时，他流下了悲伤的眼泪。这些眼泪被收集在神圣的小瓶子里，保存在了圣骨匣内。
languages.original_text: As he watched the fall of the shrine world Igrimont from orbit, Saint Falstow shed mournful tears, which were collected in a sacred vial and placed in the reliquary.

traits.locale_text: 当圣法尔斯托从星轨上看着神殿世界伊格里蒙特陨落时，他流下了悲伤的眼泪。这些眼泪被收集在神圣的小瓶子里，保存在了圣骨匣内。

languages.text: 聖ファルストウは、軌道上からイグリモント礼拝惑星を見守りながら悲しみの涙を流し、その涙は聖なる小瓶に集められ、聖遺物箱に納められた。
languages.original_text: As he watched the fall of the shrine world Igrimont from orbit, Saint Falstow shed mournful tears, which were collected in a sacred vial and placed in the reliquary.

traits.locale_text: 聖ファルストウは、軌道上からイグリモント礼拝惑星を見守りながら悲しみの涙を流し、その涙は聖なる小瓶に集められ、聖遺物箱に納められた。

languages.text: Al ver la caída del mundo santuario de Igrimont desde la órbita, san Falstow lloró pesaroso. Sus lágrimas fueron recogidas en un frasco sagrado y colocadas en un relicario.
languages.original_text: As he watched the fall of the shrine world Igrimont from orbit, Saint Falstow shed mournful tears, which were collected in a sacred vial and placed in the reliquary.

traits.locale_text: Al ver la caída del mundo santuario de Igrimont desde la órbita, san Falstow lloró pesaroso. Sus lágrimas fueron recogidas en un frasco sagrado y colocadas en un relicario.

languages.text: Les larmes de chagrin versées par Saint Falstow devant le triste spectacle de la chute du monde sanctuaire d'Igrimont furent recueillies dans une fiole sacrée avant d'être placées dans le reliquaire.
languages.original_text: As he watched the fall of the shrine world Igrimont from orbit, Saint Falstow shed mournful tears, which were collected in a sacred vial and placed in the reliquary.

traits.locale_text: Les larmes de chagrin versées par Saint Falstow devant le triste spectacle de la chute du monde-sanctuaire d'Igrimont furent recueillies dans une fiole sacrée avant d'être placées dans le reliquaire.

languages.text: Als er den Untergang der Schreinwelt Igrimont aus dem Orbit betrachtete, vergoss St. Falstow bittere Tränen, die in einer heiligen Phiole aufgefangen und in dieses Reliquiar platziert wurden.
languages.original_text: As he watched the fall of the shrine world Igrimont from orbit, Saint Falstow shed mournful tears, which were collected in a sacred vial and placed in the reliquary.

traits.locale_text: Als er den Untergang der Schreinwelt Igrimont aus dem Orbit betrachtete, vergoss St. Falstow bittere Tränen, die in einer heiligen Phiole aufgefangen und in dieses Reliquiar platziert wurden.

languages.text: Aziz Falstow, İgrimont mabet dünyasının çöküşünü yörüngeden izlerken kederle gözyaşları dökmüş; bu gözyaşları da kutsal bir şişede toplanarak kutsal emanet odasına konmuştur.
languages.original_text: As he watched the fall of the shrine world Igrimont from orbit, Saint Falstow shed mournful tears, which were collected in a sacred vial and placed in the reliquary.
